sect1.title: Deploying &o_container; (Optional)
sect1.para: &o_container; is an &ostack; project which offers container orchestration engines for deploying and managing containers as first class resources in &ostack;.
For more information about &o_container;, see the &ostack; documentation at .
For information on how to deploy a Kubernetes cluster (either from command line or from the &o_dash; ‐), see the &cloudsuppl;. It is available from .
The following Attributes can be configured for &o_container;:

listitem.para: Increases the amount of information that is written to the log files when set to true.
Shows debugging output in the log files when set to true.
Domain name to use for creating trustee for bays.

sect2.title: &haSetup; for &o_container;
sect2.para: Making &o_container; highly available requires no special configuration. It is sufficient to deploy it on a cluster.
